An authoritative database on complimentary and alternative medicines and therapies including search functions for interactions, effectiveness, nutrient depletion, pregnancy & lactation, and adverse effects (hosted by trc). A searchable platform of herbs, probiotics and brands for clinical practice, with the ability to filter for Australian products. Compile a comparison list to compare up to 5 products at once, and print directly from the prescribing list for your clients. Search for scientific, technical, and medical research including book chapters and open access content. Offering a simultaneous search over 5 databases (Scholary Journals, Books, Videos & Audio, Dissertations & Theses).
